name: Filament (alpha)
description:
Filament is a relaxed puzzle game where you guide small robots through a series of levels, solving puzzles with nothing but the lights on their heads and the cables that tether them.

Created for the 2017 Epic MegaJam. Now under full development!

Music by Gideon Ward.

Sound effects courtesy of Brand Name Audio. Find more here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA8luKdJ7MAFj4-LB3gFjXQ
